title: 2003년 Layton 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Layton. 판결일: 2003-02-03. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Darryl G. Layton
**판결일**: 2003-02-03
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 302 A.D.2d 408
- 754 N.Y.S.2d 553

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by the defendant, by permission, from an order of the County Court, Suffolk County (Weber, J.), dated October 26, 2001, which denied his motion pursuant to CPL 440.10 to vacate a judgment of conviction of the same court, rendered April 15, 1999, convicting him of robbery in the first degree and robbery in the second degree, upon a jury verdict, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the order is affirmed, for the reasons stated by the County Court in its order dated October 26, 2001. Florio, J.P., Feuerstein, McGinity and Schmidt, JJ., concur.
...
